Comment:
The pinning move 5. .. Bg4 would put the question to the center indirectly. Continuing with 6. h3 Bh5 7. g4 prepares for a full scale King side assault.

The Main lines of the Mieses Variation follows 5 .. c6 6.Bc4 Bf5 7.Ne5 e6 8.g4 Bg6 9.h4 Nbd7 ... 1-0 (Viswanathan Anand - Joel Lautier, 1997), and
6.Ne5 Be6 7.Bd3 Nbd7 8.f4 g6 9.O-O Bg7 10.Kh1 Bf5 11.Bc4 e6 ... 1-0 (Kasparov - Anand, 1995).

called for, even at the cost of the a pawn following the inevitable rook exchange.
